item.description:
Peace of Mind: Worry Free Days, Restful Nights
Mother Clare Watts
Thursday, September 17 â€¢ 7:30 p.m.

Are you one of those people who just wants some peace of mind? Do your thoughts and worries torment you and keep you from feeling peace? People often say that they would give most anything to have peace of mind. Why is it so elusive? Real peace of mind comes from knowing the spiritual truths that we are the masters of our minds and that life and God are good. Come hear Mother Clare Watts speak about these spiritual realities and begin reaping the peaceful fruits of a disciplined and faithful mind.

Suggested Donation: $25

www.CentersOfLight.org
item.how_to_find_us: We're Just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the orange line.
item.name: Seminar: Peace of Mind: Worry Free Days, Restful Nights
